name: Soaring Heart's Nurse King
description: Nurse King is named for a dear friend and nursing colleage. He is precious as a survivor of his very special dam Footloose Acres Pearl and Dr David both deceased. He has great promise and pairs some of our strongest lines. King is polled and the first chocolate for us. We look forward to his kids with Tundra (sold but with first choice doeling), And Fille.

name: Soaring Heart's Dean Dr David RN
description: Dean Dr. David RN is another buck honoring a great friend and colleague. His sire Dr. David RN is now an interim Dean of one of our nursing schools, hence the promotion in this beautiful son. Dean is funny like his dam Tundra and inherited her blue eyes as well, he inherited his sire's polled head. We look forward to kids out of Kamala and Rain.

name: Soaring Heart's Versailles
description: Versaills is the son of our 1st lady Hillary and Mal Maison. Champions and proven milk production both sire and dam. He was a later kid and is just begining to figure things out. He has a very cute pompador and is a quiet low key dude like his dad. We look forward to kids out of Pepper and Pearlyna this year.
